Author: SalehRobbins
Text: To meet the medical classification do you actually have to be underweight? What the actual fuck.

Author: fitgeek69
Text: You are valid. I truly believe that eating disorders, regardless of medical classification, can occur at any weight and body type. I hate the widespread belief that anorexia looks like an emaciated person. Iâ€™ve known anorexics who have struggled with the disorder for years admit that they struggled the most when they were at a healthy weight. Weight has nothing to do with the fact that eating disorders are also mental illnesses.
